member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The integer value of the max lines available for the file

member.name: M:Cpts_321_HW3.FibonacciTextReader.ReadLine
member.summary: Calculates the next number in the fibonacci sequence based on the value of this.lineNumber
member.returns: The next number in the fibonacci sequence as a string

member.name: M:Cpts_321_HW3.FibonacciTextReader.ReadToEnd
member.summary: Calls ReadLine as many times as specified by this.maxLines, and concatenates results to a single string

member.name: M:Cpts_321_HW3.FibonacciTextReader.First10_FibonacciTest
member.summary: Tests the ability of ReadLine to generate the first 10 elements of the fibonacci sequence

member.name: M:Cpts_321_HW3.FibonacciTextReader.TotalLinesTest
member.summary: Verifies that the number of fibonacci items returned by ReadToEnd matches the given max lines

member.name: M:Cpts_321_HW3.FibonacciTextReader.ReadAllLinesTest
member.summary: Tests the output of the ReadToEnd function when maxLines is set to 5
